title: My phone is hanging every day and I am unable to receive calls nor able to make calls.
content: My phone is hanging every day. Secondly I am unable to accept or reject any call, I have to wait till the phone is not disconnected. Thirdly when every I have to make a call I have to try It for 3-4 times then only the other person can hear me. I got the phone formatted around 5-6 months back but the same issue is arising again now. Please help me.
